name: Bomber Dog
description:
My first attempt at learning Godot Networking. 

This is a multiplayer Battle Royal Game. Currently requires Port Forwarding to play with other people or use Hamachi or VPN to host server. If you set IP to 127.0. 0.1 you can open 2 instances of the game on the same computer. 

use arrow keys to move, z or space to plant bombs. Collect hearts around the map or kill players to get hearts to increase your score. First to score 20 wins or last one standing as if your score goes to 0 you lose. If all the bushes are destroyed the game ends as well. 

Made for Finally Finish Something 2021
